content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5) for storing iron plates.
- Two Burner Inserters at positions (-14.5, -46.5) and (-14.5, -45.5) managing the movement of items between entities.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) managing the movement of items between entities.

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source entity connected to the inserter has items available for transfer. Regularly check and refill the source entities to prevent inserters from idling.

### Chest at Drop Position is Full
- Regularly empty chests at drop positions to prevent mining drills from halting operations due to full inventories.

### Furnace Result is Full
- Regularly extract smelted items from furnaces to prevent them from stopping production when their output inventory is full.

### No Ingredients to Smelt
- Ensure that furnaces have a continuous supply of raw materials to maintain production efficiency. Regularly check and refill the source inventories.
